Texts.Chs: 不记得你把悬浮车停在哪里了？只要从原始像素中重新组成它就可以了！
Texts.Eng: Can't remember where you parked your hoverbike? Just reconstitute it from raw pixels!

Texts.Chs: 把你的车子器放到这里来修 - 花上小额像素就可以骑了！
Texts.Eng: Get your fixer-upper fixed up here - a few pixels and you're ready to ride!

Texts.Chs: 修车杰哥强啊。他长着一张开朗的脸，修起东西来像个专家！
Texts.Eng: Good old Roger Repairo. He's got a cheerful face, and he fixes things like an expert!

Texts.Chs: 他看起来确实很高兴整天都在修东西。
Texts.Eng: He sure does look happy to be fixin' things all day.

Texts.Chs: 我教了我兄弟所有他所能知道的，你懂的！
Texts.Eng: I taught my brother everything he knows, you know!

Texts.Chs: 是修车杰哥，他修理丢失或损坏的车辆以获取像素。
Texts.Eng: It's Roger Repairo, who repairs lost or broken vehicles for pixels.

Texts.Chs: 闪亮的金属人修修修复问题。
这个机械人可以熟练地修理损坏的车辆。
Texts.Eng: This mechanical man can expertly fix broken vehicles.

Texts.Chs: 这个机械人是修理东西的专家。
Texts.Eng: This mechanical man is an expert at fixing things.

Texts.Chs: 这个机械商人笑面藏刀，但绝对牛逼。
Texts.Eng: This mechanical merchant is disconcertingly cheerful, but undoubtedly effective.

Texts.Chs: 这名机械商人将熟练地修理损坏的车辆。
Texts.Eng: This mechanical merchant will skilfully fix broken vehicles.

Texts.Chs: 只需一些像素，我们就可以在瞬间磨去那些难看的缺口和凹痕!
Texts.Eng: With a few pixels, we can polish out those unsightly nicks and dents in a jiffy!
